Learn 2 Forge.name: Learn 2 Forge
Learn 2 Forge.desc: Get the mining certificate from Glumlee.

Classy!.name: Classy!
Classy!.desc: Choose one of the 3 starting classes from Promotheus.

Hitting the Mark.name: Hitting the Mark
Hitting the Mark.desc: Chop 15 yellow sections in a row during the Choppin' Minigame.

Learn 2 Entertain.name: Learn 2 Entertain
Learn 2 Entertain.desc: Get the golden jam from the Picnic Stowaway.

5 'hunned Copper.name: 5 'hunned Copper
5 'hunned Copper.desc: Have a stack of exactly 500 Copper Ore in your Storage Chest.

1.5 Ki'log'grams.name: 1.5 Ki'log'grams
1.5 Ki'log'grams.desc: Have a stack of exactly 1500 Oak Logs in your Storage Chest.

Copper Quipment.name: Copper Quipment
Copper Quipment.desc: Equip the Copper Helmet and Copper Platebody

The Sculpture Within.name: The Sculpture Within
The Sculpture Within.desc: Buy the Sculpting Tools from the Blunder Hills town shop

Card Collector.name: Card Collector
Card Collector.desc: Collect 10 unique cards. They drop randomly from monsters!

Do What You're Told.name: Do What You're Told
Do What You're Told.desc: Complete 25 unique quests. Unique here means different

Learn 2 Translate.name: Learn 2 Translate
Learn 2 Translate.desc: Get the scouting report from Stiltzcho

Wode Together.name: Wode Together
Wode Together.desc: Defeat 250 Wode Boards with at least 1 other party member

2 Tons of Iron.name: 2 Tons of Iron
2 Tons of Iron.desc: Have a stack of exactly 2,000 Iron Ore in your Storage Chest.

Giga Decimation.name: Giga Decimation
Giga Decimation.desc: Defeat all Giga Frogs before any respawn.

Shut it Poochy.name: Shut it Poochy
Shut it Poochy.rewards: the stone golem wolf of the Encroaching Forest.

Slimeicidal Endeavor.name: Slimeicidal Endeavor
Slimeicidal Endeavor.desc: Defeat 25,000 slimes in total. This counts kills from all your characters!

5-6 Pick up Sticks.name: 5-6 Pick up Sticks
5-6 Pick up Sticks.desc: Have a stack of exactly 20,000 Sticks in your Storage Chest.

20 Bundles of Jungle.name: 20 Bundles of Jungle
20 Bundles of Jungle.desc: Have a stack of exactly 20,000 Forest Fibers in your Storage Chest.

Colosseum Contender.name: Colosseum Contender
Colosseum Contender.desc: Get a score of 25,000 or more in the Dewdrop Colosseum.

Crystal Beatdown.name: Crystal Beatdown
Crystal Beatdown.rewards: who have a 1 in 2000 chance of spawning when a monster dies.

Ten Trips of Gold.name: Ten Trips of Gold
Ten Trips of Gold.desc: Have a stack of exactly 30,000 Gold Ore in your Storage Chest.

Minecart Maniac.name: Minecart Maniac
Minecart Maniac.desc: Slam on a yellow ore vein in the Mining Minigame

Spike Minigame Master.name: Spike Minigame Master
Spike Minigame Master.desc: Get a score of 13 in the spike minigame. Remember to say 'If u love me let me go'

Anvil Expansion.name: Anvil Expansion
Anvil Expansion.rewards: and unlock a new tab of item recipes!

Steppin' on the Rats.name: Steppin' on the Rats
Steppin' on the Rats.desc: Defeat 500 Rats with at least 1 other party member

Tree Top Dropout.name: Tree Top Dropout
Tree Top Dropout.desc: Reach the top of the Giant Tree in Blunder Hills

Naked and Unafraid.name: Naked and Unafraid
Naked and Unafraid.desc: Enter the Sewers with no equipment or weapon
Naked and Unafraid.rewards: and defeat a sewer poop. Don't want to get your stuff dirty!

House Flipper.name: House Flipper
House Flipper.desc: Defeat Baba Yaga in under 25 seconds after they spawn in the Birch Enclave

Platinum 200G.name: Platinum 200G
Platinum 200G.desc: Have a stack of exactly 200,000 Platinum Ore in your Storage Chest.

Boss Buster.name: Boss Buster
Boss Buster.desc: Defeat both minibosses in Blunder Hills

Minecart Master.name: Minecart Master
Minecart Master.desc: Get a score of 103+ in the Mining Minigame

Choppin' to the Beat.name: Choppin' to the Beat
Choppin' to the Beat.desc: Get a score of 141+ in the Choppin' Minigame

Nice Fur Suit.name: Nice Fur Suit
Nice Fur Suit.desc: Equip all 4 pieces of Amarok armor.

Half a Mill-log.name: Half a Mill-log
Half a Mill-log.desc: Have a stack of exactly 500,000 Veiny Logs in your Storage Chest.

Two-Time Savior.name: Two-Time Savior
Two-Time Savior.rewards: while also having another in your inventory.

Million Null 'n Void.name: Million Null 'n Void
Million Null 'n Void.desc: Have a stack of exactly 1,000,000 Void Ore in your Storage Chest.

What a View!.name: What a View!
What a View!.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Climb the 2nd tallest tree in all of Blunder Hills

Seriousleaf-ast!.name: Seriousleaf-ast!
Seriousleaf-ast!.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Score a point in the Choppin' Minigame while the leaf is zooming at hyperspeed

Peanut Pioneer.name: Peanut Pioneer
Peanut Pioneer.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Talk to the jungle bush

Meel Time!.name: Meel Time!
Meel Time!.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Shake it! To the left

Pro Gamer Move.name: Pro Gamer Move
Pro Gamer Move.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Keep the oil. Precious

Meet the Dev.name: Meet the Dev
Meet the Dev.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ I heard he's 12 feet tall and can spawn bosses just by talking...

Heyo!.name: Heyo!
Heyo!.desc: Say 'Hi' to 250 different people without closing the game.

Anothervil Expansion.name: Anothervil Expansion
Anothervil Expansion.desc: Craft the Anvil III expander. More things to craft

Based Roots.name: Based Roots
Based Roots.rewards: which is the map below the Sticks monsters in the Giant Tree

Dungeon Pinch.name: Dungeon Pinch
Dungeon Pinch.desc: Deal 100 or more damage in a single hit in any party dungeon.

Big Frog Angry.name: Big Frog Angry
Big Frog Angry.rewards: *2% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

Big Frog Furious.name: Big Frog Furious
Big Frog Furious.rewards: *3% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

Big Frog Big Sad.name: Big Frog Big Sad
Big Frog Big Sad.rewards: *5% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

2 minute meal.name: 2 minute meal
2 minute meal.desc: Spawn Grandfrogger within 2 minutes of entering the dungeon.

More and More Me!.name: More and More Me!
More and More Me!.rewards: who will never appreciate the struggle your first 3 characters had.

Golden Fly.name: Golden Fly
Golden Fly.desc: Pass through the small golden hoop in the Catching Minigame. It's worth 3 points!

Hammer Bub.name: Hammer Bub
Hammer Bub.desc: Level up the 'Hammer Hammer' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 10

Wassup Yo!.name: Wassup Yo!
Wassup Yo!.desc: Say 'Hi' to 100 unique people without closing the game or changing Servers.

Gold School.name: Gold School
Gold School.desc: Have a stack of exactly 1500 Goldfish in your Storage Chest.

Buzz Buzz.name: Buzz Buzz
Buzz Buzz.desc: Have a stack of exactly 2500 Flies in your Storage Chest.

Careful.name: Careful
Careful.rewards: Have a stack of exactly 15 Glass Shards in your Storage Chest.

Hybernation.name: Hybernation
Hybernation.desc: Leave one of your players AFK for an entire week
Hybernation.rewards: which is 168 hours! Anything more counts too!

Specializational!.name: Specializational!
Specializational!.desc: Choose a subclass for two of your characters.

Obols Oh Boy!.name: Obols Oh Boy!
Obols Oh Boy!.desc: Have 10 Silver Obols equipped at once. The Family tab counts here!

Well Learned.name: Well Learned
Well Learned.desc: Get a lv 92 or higher Star Book from Alchemy! The 1st one

B-o-B to Help.name: B-o-B to Help
B-o-B to Help.desc: Complete 75 unique quests on a single character. I'm not sure what B-o-B stands for either...

Card Enthusiast.name: Card Enthusiast
Card Enthusiast.desc: Collect 30 unique cards. If u wanna trade
Card Enthusiast.rewards: I got some spare Amarok cards!

Efaunt Trumped.name: Efaunt Trumped
Efaunt Trumped.rewards: the Mummified Elephant God. He will remember you doing this.

Fishing Finesse.name: Fishing Finesse
Fishing Finesse.desc: Get a score of 67+ in the Fishing Minigame

Catching Coronation.name: Catching Coronation
Catching Coronation.desc: Get a score of 128+ in the Catching Minigame

Crystal Superslam.name: Crystal Superslam
Crystal Superslam.desc: Defeat 100 Crystal Mobs. This could go a couple rounds...

Slumbering Gamer.name: Slumbering Gamer
Slumbering Gamer.desc: Claim 2000+ hours of AFK progress across all characters. So lazy!

My First Trophy!.name: My First Trophy!
My First Trophy!.rewards: other than the limited edition ones which don't count lol.

A Fish Too Far.name: A Fish Too Far
A Fish Too Far.desc: Catch a total of 1000 fish across all Fishing Minigame plays.

Rat-a-tat-tat.name: Rat-a-tat-tat
Rat-a-tat-tat.desc: Level up the 'FMJ' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 30

Pillars of Sand.name: Pillars of Sand
Pillars of Sand.desc: Defeat 250,000 Sandy Pots combined across all characters. Forget the Pillars of Salt though.

Trial by Time.name: Trial by Time
Trial by Time.desc: Run from Town to Efaunt's Tomb in under 2 minutes
Trial by Time.rewards: with less than 132% move speed. No teleporting.

Golden Obolden!.name: Golden Obolden!
Golden Obolden!.desc: Have 15 Golden Obols equipped at once. The Family tab counts here!

Monocle No More.name: Monocle No More
Monocle No More.desc: Defeat 160 Sand Giants within 10 minutes of entering the map. Auto must be off.

Jellyfish Jelly.name: Jellyfish Jelly
Jellyfish Jelly.desc: Have a stack of exactly 6000 Jellyfish in your Storage Chest. I heard their Jelly goes good with burgers btw.

Super Cereal.name: Super Cereal
Super Cereal.desc: Have a stack of exactly 50,000 Sentient Cereal in your Storage Chest.

Sweet Victory.name: Sweet Victory
Sweet Victory.desc: Get a Score of 200,000 or more in the Sandstone Colosseum

Ink Blot.name: Ink Blot
Ink Blot.desc: Use 101 silver pens in the Post Office
Ink Blot.rewards: 20% chance to keep &silver pens after &using one

Demon Demolisher.name: Demon Demolisher
Demon Demolisher.desc: Defeat the big hourglass and the toilet paper guy!

Dumbo Destroyer.name: Dumbo Destroyer
Dumbo Destroyer.desc: Defeat Chaotic Efaunt. Look out for the kick

Threadin' the Needle.name: Threadin' the Needle
Threadin' the Needle.desc: Pass through the teenie tiny Lava hoop in the Catching Minigame. It only appears if you go through 20 hoops in a row!

S-M-R-T.name: S-M-R-T
S-M-R-T.desc: Level up the 'Smarty Boi' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 50

Two Desserts!.name: Two Desserts!
Two Desserts!.desc: Have the YumYum Sheriff trophy equipped
Two Desserts!.rewards: while also having another in your inventory.

Bigtime Bloacher.name: Bigtime Bloacher
Bigtime Bloacher.desc: Have a stack of exactly 100,000 Bloaches in your Storage Chest.

Vial Junkee.name: Vial Junkee
Vial Junkee.rewards: which are the hyperlight Orange ones. Stop focusing so much on vials

Fruit Salad.name: Fruit Salad
Fruit Salad.desc: Have a stack of exactly 1,000,000 Fruit Flies in your Storage Chest.

WAAAAAAAHH!.name: WAAAAAAAHH!
WAAAAAAAHH!.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Complete all available Treasure Hunts! You can find them on Youtube

Bobjoepicklejar.name: Bobjoepicklejar
Bobjoepicklejar.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Pickles belong in containers

Fish Aint Biting.name: Fish Aint Biting
Fish Aint Biting.rewards: the fish ain't bitin' today gosh darn it!

Skill Master.name: Skill Master
Skill Master.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Goldric's bag of peanuts may be nearly empty
Skill Master.rewards: but even just one peanut is enough for some...

Tomb Raider.name: Tomb Raider
Tomb Raider.rewards: *2% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

Tomb Defiler.name: Tomb Defiler
Tomb Defiler.rewards: *3% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

Tomb Completionist.name: Tomb Completionist
Tomb Completionist.rewards: *5% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

Wazzzzam!.name: Wazzzzam!
Wazzzzam!.desc: Wazam 125 rooms in Snakenhotep's Dungeon by performing exceptionally well in a room.

Just Passing By.name: Just Passing By
Just Passing By.desc: Pass 30 rooms in Snakenhotep's Dungeon by doing the thingy the room says to do.

Dungeon Slap.name: Dungeon Slap
Dungeon Slap.desc: Deal 1000 or more damage in a single hit within any Dungeon.

Snowy Wonderland.name: Snowy Wonderland
Snowy Wonderland.rewards: the coolest world in the game!

Veteran Gamer.name: Veteran Gamer
Veteran Gamer.desc: Reach level 80 on any character. I'm glad you're enjoying the game

A Family of Me!.name: A Family of Me!
A Family of Me!.rewards: who will never get the love you gave to your earlier characters when making new ones was still special.

Croakin' Froge.name: Croakin' Froge
Croakin' Froge.desc: Have a stack of exactly 250 Doge -I mean froge- critters in your Storage Chest.

Sad Souls.name: Sad Souls
Sad Souls.desc: Have a stack of exactly 1,000 Forest Souls in your Storage Chest.

Checkout Takeout.name: Checkout Takeout
Checkout Takeout.desc: Checkout a total of 1000 talent books from the Talent Book Library
Checkout Takeout.rewards: *5 Book Max LV &*30% Library charge rate

Yawning Cogs.name: Yawning Cogs
Yawning Cogs.desc: Have 4 unclaimed Yellow Cogs during any single moment in time

Blunder Skull.name: Blunder Skull
Blunder Skull.desc: Get a Copper Skull or higher on every Blunder Hills monster in the Deathnote.

To Cute To Live.name: To Cute To Live
To Cute To Live.desc: You're gonna kill all them lil' poofs? You monster... well

Big Mobs Eek.name: Big Mobs Eek
Big Mobs Eek.desc: Defeat 5 Giant Monsters. Giants only spawn IF you equip the Titan Tachion prayer
Big Mobs Eek.rewards: unlocked by beating wave 10 of Waka Tower Defence (world 2)

Powdered Neutronium.name: Powdered Neutronium
Powdered Neutronium.desc: Rank up the Explosive Combustion refinery chamber to Rank 2.

Soulslike.name: Soulslike
Soulslike.desc: Have 4 Prayers in your Prayer Rock thingy. You get Prayers by placing these wizard dudes into towers and stuff and kickin' butt!

Good Times Roll.name: Good Times Roll
Good Times Roll.desc: Beat wave 50 in Glublin Gorefest using ONLY Boulder Roller wizards. No freeze

Cog in the System.name: Cog in the System
Cog in the System.desc: Have 20 Grey Cogs placed on the board at once. Not sure why this is an achievement

I Create....name: I Create...
I Create....desc: Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 50 times. Any buildings

I Sawed....name: I Sawed...
I Sawed....desc: Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 250 times.

Giant Slayer.name: Giant Slayer
Giant Slayer.desc: Defeat 5 Giant Mobs of each type Bloque

Saharan Skull.name: Saharan Skull
Saharan Skull.desc: Get a Golden Skull or higher on every YumYum Desert monster in the Deathnote.

Fat Souls.name: Fat Souls
Fat Souls.desc: Have a stack of exactly 10,000 Dune Souls in your Storage Chest.

Borrowed Pens.name: Borrowed Pens
Borrowed Pens.desc: Remember all those pens you lent out in school and never got back? You've got 13 seconds to vent your anger on every penguin mob!

Large Fortune.name: Large Fortune
Large Fortune.rewards: as far as the idleon government knows

Sqeakin' Mousey.name: Sqeakin' Mousey
Sqeakin' Mousey.desc: Have a stack of exactly 60,000 Mouseys in your Storage Chest. Imagine the noise in that chest of yours... or even the smell

Geared for Success.name: Geared for Success
Geared for Success.desc: Have 40 Yellow Cogs placed on the board at once. Alright now I see how this is achievement worthy

Guild Higher-Up.name: Guild Higher-Up
Guild Higher-Up.rewards: putting you above the other guild members who only have the 500 GP Achievment!

Legendary Gamer.name: Legendary Gamer
Legendary Gamer.desc: Reach level 100 on any character! Just 4 more digits and you'd have a phone number!

Entangled Compounds.name: Entangled Compounds
Entangled Compounds.desc: Rank up the Spontaneous Combustion refinery chamber to Rank 3.

There Can Be Only 1.name: There Can Be Only 1
There Can Be Only 1.desc: Beat wave 50 of Wakawaka War without using more than 1 of any specific tower. Can't have 2 pulsers

Blurple Skull.name: Blurple Skull
Blurple Skull.desc: Get a Dementia Skull or higher on every Frostbite Tundra monster in the Deathnote.

Souped Up Salts.name: Souped Up Salts
Souped Up Salts.desc: Rank up the Redox Combustion refinery chamber to Rank 10.

I Constructed!.name: I Constructed!
I Constructed!.desc: Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 900 times.

Cogs Be Waitin'.name: Cogs Be Waitin'
Cogs Be Waitin'.desc: Have 16 unclaimed Grey Cogs at once. Jeez
Cogs Be Waitin'.rewards: I'm glad anthropomorphic cogs aren't real.

Simpin' for NPC's.name: Simpin' for NPC's
Simpin' for NPC's.desc: Complete 150 unique quests on a single character. Apparently people find 'simp' offensive
Simpin' for NPC's.rewards: and I'm kinda offended by that...

Top Cogs.name: Top Cogs
Top Cogs.desc: 78 Cogs. All purple cogs. Did I say cogs are great? I think cogs are great. Cog cog cog!

Card Dude.name: Card Dude
Card Dude.desc: Collect 120 unique cards. Not sure why something as mundane as 'dude' is the descriptor here
Card Dude.rewards: don't read too much into it.

Crystal Champ.name: Crystal Champ
Crystal Champ.desc: Defeat 2000 crystal mobs. You must've watched a whole lotta Dev Streams to get this!

Smirky Souls.name: Smirky Souls
Smirky Souls.desc: Have a stack of exactly 250,000 Rooted Souls in your Storage Chest.

Comatosed Gamer.name: Comatosed Gamer
Comatosed Gamer.desc: Claim 30,000+ Hrs of AFK gains. Thats two years

Knock on Wood.name: Knock on Wood
Knock on Wood.desc: Beat wave 50 of Acorn Assault with just 4 towers active. Place down a 5th tower at any time

The Goose is Loose.name: The Goose is Loose
The Goose is Loose.desc: Have a HONK of exactly 1,000,000 Honkers in your HONK Chest. HONKHONKHONK HOOOONK!!!

Sepia Vision.name: Sepia Vision
Sepia Vision.desc: Have a stack of exactly 500 Blank Lenses in your Storage Chest. Better complete this before I make it 1,000!

Rattle them Bones.name: Rattle them Bones
Rattle them Bones.desc: Defeat every Bloodbone in just 12 seconds after entering the map. Wow

A Most Nice Sale.name: A Most Nice Sale
A Most Nice Sale.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ You SOLD gems to the World 3 town store...? All at once? How many...? Nice.

Cool Score!.name: Cool Score!
Cool Score!.rewards: 500,000 or more in the Chillsnap Colosseum

Dungeon Wallop.name: Dungeon Wallop
Dungeon Wallop.desc: Deal 25000 or more damage in a single hit within any Dungeon.
Dungeon Wallop.rewards: *4% Crit Chance Bonus &for all characters &outside of dungeon

Boss Defeated.name: Boss Defeated
Boss Defeated.rewards: *2% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

Manager Defeated.name: Manager Defeated
Manager Defeated.rewards: *3% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

Kingpin Defeated.name: Kingpin Defeated
Kingpin Defeated.rewards: *5% Total DMG for all &characters outside &of dungeons

Capitalist Win.name: Capitalist Win
Capitalist Win.desc: Complete 1000 jobs within the Glacial Basement dungeon.
Capitalist Win.rewards: *5% Class EXP for all &characters outside &of dungeons
